I really like this game but ever since I fully upgraded one of the characters idk what to do next. Like why should I start working on a new character for slightly different and much worse perks than my fully upgraded one? I don't see any reason and and I have never played killer cause I don't want to get bullied and harassed if I do anything wrong. Besides those reasons it's very fun and can get your heart racing which is what a game like this should do.

Though it has it flaws, this game is enjoyable for the most part. The matchmaking is probably the worst part of this game. High ranks are placed with low ranks far to often and there really isn't a middle group.

I enjoy being able to play as iconic horror villains and can't wait to see what other IPs get brought into the game.

Dead by daylight é igual a punheta, sozinho é bom mas com dois ainda fica melhor

É como se você fosse um protagonista de um filme de Terror , onde você pode escolher entre ser vítima ou o vilão, tensão e estrategia. Mesmo que você jogue com três jogadores na partida, a sensação de que algo está te observando é presente a todo momento! O MELHOR de tudo é que os desenvolvedores colocam muito conteudo novo e varias atualizações. O jogo também tem um esquema de fendas e livros que são missões que vc desbloqueia cosmeticos (skins, armas e etc...).

Jedna z fajniejszych gier, w które miałam okazje zagrać ale mimo to:

Bez swoich ludzi jako ocalały nie ma co grać, matchmaking do naprawy, tak samo jak system wbijania rangi. Wszystko dzieje się za szybko, gracze wbijają range w okamgnieniu, przez co można liczyć się z dość amatorskim zagraniem całej drużyny. Nieostrożne ściąganie z haka czy nieprzemyślane ruchy, prowadzą do poirytowania i grania pod presją. 
Oczywiście, zdarza się dość zgrany team, co trzeba przyznać, jest rzadkością. Gra wtedy na ogół przyjemna, teamwork na wysokim poziomie i komunikacja za pomocą jakichkolwiek gestów, wygrana w kieszeni. 

Trzeba przyznać też, że nic nie denerwuje bardziej od campera murdulca, który jedyne co potrafi to stanie przy haku. Mimo przewagi ocalałych nie da sie zrobić nic, co pomogło by wisielcowi. Tymbardziej bez voice chatu, który moim zdaniem ułatwiłby gre przeciw takim spoconym killerom. Gestami ciężko jest wytłumaczyć co chcemy zrobic.


Gra mimo to godna polecenia, grafika oddaje
Mükemmel bir oyun
A
I recommend playing this if you want to have a tiny bit of fun 1 in every 10 games. Do not recommend if you are  suicidal in any way.

Do you know what suffering is ? This game is the definition of it. We have lazy developers that don't care about the community, tunneling killers, toxic survivors, a flawed system that forces you to grind for hours, bugs and only one gamemode. You either play as a survivor or a killer, that's it. And despite all that, there's something fun about this game. It pulls you in, but you have to be willing to suffer. It has it's fun moments, you can meet some cool people and sometimes there's funny shit that happens or some intense matches that have both sides sweating. This game is true suffering, and that's why we love it. Because we hate ourselves.

Dead by Daylight is a pretty entertaining title overall, just make sure to have some friends to play with, because it can be sometimes really irritating, if you play alone (unless you wiil play as the killer). The basics of the game aren't really complicated and it is really easy to get into the game. However, I recommend to buy the game on a sale, because at least in my opinion, the game is a little too overpriced for an online game. The community of the game is fine, but as I said earlier, you should still get some friends to play with, because, well... toxic people are a bother here :/. I would give this game a solid 8/10, you should definitely try it out! Peace!

人类是你爹是吧？车队一挂一台机，恶咒跟路灯一样，别给我说因为我玩的菜，平衡不好就是不好，矿洞全是板窗，车队四个人博弈一个屠夫，我玩你妈，贞子版本我以为会好点，xxxxxxx也一样，贞子除了天赋就尼玛白板，传送叠咒怨慢的一批，人类放录像带就一两秒，我rnm那人咒怨满了就在我面前，碟片一放咒怨就没了，当着我面没了？？？？？玩你马的骨灰盒，谢谢dbd治好了我的低血压，rnm神医，平衡用脑子做做吧。玩了很久了，今天心态崩了，第一次喷。舔狗车队别喷，喷你就是对的，尼玛的骨灰撒大海都是对的。这个游戏确实好游戏，但是咱不反馈这些问题就会一直不把屠夫玩家当人，屠夫晚上秒配，配上就是车队，玩啥？玩尼玛的棺材板。车队技能弄上，人人都是聪明逼。有人会说你自己没车队，对对对你是对的拿着一点平衡福利去玩，那么祝这些人尼玛斯了需要你车队的人去抬。你就是大孝子。他妈的搬一个人两个手电筒，一个搁钩子那里卡着？？？再来个脱缰野马哈哈哈哈我是屠夫马上被人挂树上了哈哈哈哈。迷雾里人类还有无线电还能爆点，合不合适？能开黑就平衡一下啊。希望这个游戏能做好平衡吧。
